snippet: In two years, a one-mile stretch of 14th Street is expected to gain more than 1,200 housing units and more than 85,000 square feet of retail space.
abstract: Every block along a one-mile strip of 14th Street NW in Washington, DC, is slated to gain a new or renovated building containing residential units and ground-floor retail space within two years; plans call for strip to have more than 1,200 additional housing units and more than 85,000 square feet of additional retail space.
lead_paragraph: In two years, a one-mile stretch of 14th Street is expected to gain more than 1,200 housing units and more than 85,000 square feet of retail space.

headline.seo: In Washington, 14th Street N.W. Attracts Upscale Developers
headline.main: In D.C., a Street’s Grit Gives Way to Glamour
headline.print_headline: In D.C., a Street’s Grit Gives Way to Glamour
